prompts.name: Marketing Video Study Guide Creator
prompts.description: Create comprehensive, structured study guides for marketing-related educational videos. Transforms video content into organized learning materials with key concepts, definitions, practice questions, and actionable takeaways based on the Maya marketing platform's framework.

arguments.name: video_title
arguments.description: The title of the marketing-related video or educational content

arguments.name: video_transcript
arguments.description: Full transcript of the video content

arguments.name: video_description
arguments.description: Description or summary of the video content if no transcript available

arguments.name: marketing_focus
arguments.description: Primary marketing focus areas: 'SEO', 'SEM', 'Facebook', 'Email', 'Analytics', 'Competition', 'YouTube', or 'General'

arguments.name: audience_level
arguments.description: Target audience: 'beginner', 'intermediate', 'advanced', 'expert'

arguments.name: study_format
arguments.description: Preferred study guide format: 'comprehensive', 'outline', 'flashcards', 'checklist', or 'interactive'

prompts.name: Advanced Marketing Concept Explainer
prompts.description: Expert-level marketing concept explanation system with comprehensive Maya platform integration. Delivers structured, actionable explanations with industry benchmarks, practical frameworks, real-world examples, and data-driven insights. Features adaptive complexity, competitive analysis capabilities, and future trend integration for maximum learning impact.

arguments.name: concept
arguments.description: The marketing concept, metric, or term to explain (e.g., 'CTR', 'organic impressions', 'conversion rate', 'CPA', 'ROAS', 'attribution models', 'marketing qualified leads')

arguments.name: audience_level
arguments.description: Target audience knowledge level: 'beginner', 'intermediate', 'advanced', 'expert', or 'c-suite' (default: intermediate)

arguments.name: specific_context
arguments.description: Specific business context, industry, or use case where this concept applies (e.g., 'e-commerce', 'SaaS', 'B2B lead gen', 'local business', 'enterprise software')

arguments.name: related_metrics
arguments.description: Other related metrics or concepts to explain connections and interdependencies with

arguments.name: output_format
arguments.description: Desired explanation format: 'comprehensive', 'quick_reference', 'visual_framework', 'step_by_step', 'comparison_table' (default: comprehensive)

arguments.name: include_benchmarks
arguments.description: Include industry benchmarks and typical performance ranges: true/false (default: true)

arguments.name: practical_focus
arguments.description: Emphasis area: 'implementation', 'optimization', 'troubleshooting', 'strategic_planning', 'reporting' (default: implementation)

arguments.name: tool_recommendations
arguments.description: Include specific tool and platform recommendations: true/false (default: true)

arguments.name: competitive_analysis
arguments.description: Include competitive landscape analysis and benchmarking against industry leaders: true/false (default: false)

arguments.name: future_trends
arguments.description: Emphasize future trends and emerging developments in this area: true/false (default: false)

prompts.name: Avinash Kaushik Style Explainer
prompts.description: Explain complex business/marketing concepts with Avinash Kaushik's signature style - cutting through complexity with frameworks, calling out bad practices, and delivering profit-focused actionable insights with passionate conviction.

arguments.name: concept
arguments.description: The business/marketing concept to explain (e.g., 'attribution modeling', 'conversion rate optimization', 'customer lifetime value')

arguments.name: level
arguments.description: Knowledge level of the audience (e.g., 'beginner', 'intermediate', 'advanced', 'C-suite')

prompts.name: Seth Godin Style Explainer
prompts.description: Explain any concept with Seth Godin's distinctive style - clear, provocative, story-driven explanations that challenge conventional thinking and inspire action with practical wisdom.

arguments.name: concept
arguments.description: The concept to explain (e.g., 'marketing', 'leadership', 'innovation', 'customer service', 'productivity')

arguments.name: level
arguments.description: Knowledge level of the audience (e.g., 'beginner', 'intermediate', 'advanced', 'general audience')
